title: 2009/122/EC: Council Decision of 10 February 2009 appointing a United Kingdom member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
13.2.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 42/16
COUNCIL DECISION
of 10 February 2009
appointing a United Kingdom member of the Committee of the Regions
(2009/122/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Government of the United Kingdom,
Whereas:
(1) On 24 January 2006, the Council adopted Decision 2006/116/EC appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2006 to 25 January 2010 (1).
(2) A member’s seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the expiry of the mandate of Mr W.J. WILLIAMS,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions as a member for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2010:
— Mr Robert BRIGHT, Councillor, Newport City.
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 February 2009.
For the Council
The President
M. KALOUSEK
(1)  OJ L 56, 25.2.2006, p. 75.
